title: MaxSea International
description: Internship: ship detection using neural networks. Data collection and filtering, training, and integration within a Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) pipeline.

title: CNRS - LaBRI
description: Research assistant: web development (MyHigherEducationProject). Keyphrase extraction using Natural Language Processing (TF-IDF, YAKE!, RAKE...).

title: CNRS - LaBRI
description: Internship: evaluation of the performance of a machine learning model (SVM) aiming to predict the admitability of candidates (Parcoursup) to higher education. The objective of this project is to interpret the indicator provided by the SVM and evaluate its precision, while paying particular attention to type 1 errors (overestimation of admitability).

title: Laboratoire ERIC
description: A recent integrative framework proposed by researchers from Princeton University has allowed for the identification of relevant genes by detecting those whose interaction sites or other functional sites are enriched in somatic mutations in tumors. The objective of this project is to analyze this new method and enrich the associated code with new features in the non-Gaussian case.

title: Business creation
description: Prospection and commercial activities: sale of Peruvian imported products, prospection and negotiation as wholesaler.
